data.name: Sleeping Dogs: Monkey King Pack
data.detailed_description:
With the power of the immortals great strength is bestowed upon you! The Monkey King outfit includes its own buff, signature weapon, and vehicle. While wearing this full-body outfit you are automatically granted a double-handed staff during melee and can travel across Hong Kong on the unique Cloud Motorcycle.

Please note that there is no Russian language support available for this content. This DLC will not be loaded if the current language is set to Russian.
data.about_the_game:
With the power of the immortals great strength is bestowed upon you! The Monkey King outfit includes its own buff, signature weapon, and vehicle. While wearing this full-body outfit you are automatically granted a double-handed staff during melee and can travel across Hong Kong on the unique Cloud Motorcycle.

Please note that there is no Russian language support available for this content. This DLC will not be loaded if the current language is set to Russian.
data.short_description: With the power of the immortals great strength is bestowed upon you! The Monkey King outfit includes its own buff, signature weapon, and vehicle. While wearing this full-body outfit you are automatically granted a double-handed staff during melee and can travel across Hong Kong on the unique Cloud Motorcycle.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows Vista Service Pack 2, Windows 7
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®:10
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor:Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 Nvidia or AMD ATI card, Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or ATI Radeon 6950
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
